hero.title:
One help at

hero.description: Providing personalized psychological support and companionship for those who need it most. We're here to listen.

mission.title: Restoring hope through human connection and professional empathy.
mission.quote: We believe in the power of being heard. Every lotus blooms in its own time; we provide the gentle environment for that growth.

adolescents.title: Youth & Adolescents
adolescents.description: Navigating school, relationships, and identity can be overwhelming. We provide a non-judgmental ear for the younger generation.

distress.title: People in Distress
distress.description: Immediate emotional support for those facing life's hardest moments. You don't have to carry the weight alone.

elderly.title: Elderly Companionship
elderly.description: Fighting loneliness through regular companionship and active listening for our seniors in isolation.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to start your journey with us

step1.title: Reach Out
step1.description: Call or message our secure line. Our intake team is available 24/7 to hear you.

step2.title: Get Matched
step2.description: We pair you with a trained volunteer who specializes in your specific needs.

step3.title: Heal Together
step3.description: Begin regular sessions in a comfortable environment, building a bridge to recovery.

crisis.title: In immediate crisis?
crisis.description: Our emergency intervention team is standing by. Don't wait, your life and well-being matter to us.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.description: Transforming lives through compassion. We provide specialized psychological support and companionship for those navigating life's most challenging transitions.

process.title: How it Works: One help at a time
process.description: Our streamlined psychological support process guides you through every step of the journey.

step1.title: First Contact
step1.description: Reach out via our secure form or 24/7 hotline to start the journey.

step2.title: Initial Assessment
step2.description: A clinical psychologist evaluates your unique needs with empathy.

step3.title: Matching
step3.description: We pair you with a specialized volunteer that fits your profile.

step4.title: Accompaniment
step4.description: Ongoing, personalized support for as long as you need it.

hero.title: You are not alone.
hero.description: Whether you are navigating a difficult season or looking to share your strength, AYA is a sanctuary built on empathy, rebirth, and professional guidance.

tabs.title: How can we support you today?

form.title: Personalized Care
form.quote: Taking the first step is often the hardest part. We're here to listen without judgment, providing a space for your growth.

feelingOptions.guidance: I'm looking for guidance for a loved one
feelingOptions.talk: I just need someone to talk to

form.optionalPlaceholder: A brief word on what's on your mind...

volunteer.title: The Impact of Your Time
volunteer.description: AYA volunteers are the heartbeat of our organization. Like a lotus rising through water, your presence helps others find their light.

commitment.title: Flexible Commitment
commitment.description: Minimum of 4 hours per week, tailored to your schedule.

community.title: Supportive Community
community.description: Join our monthly group supervision and debriefing circles.

emergency.title: In Immediate Danger?
emergency.description: If you are experiencing a life-threatening emergency, please contact national emergency services or a crisis hotline immediately. Your safety is paramount.
